TEXT.TITLE: BURLINGTON <BUR> GETS 30.5 MLN DLR CONTRACT
TEXT.BODY: Burlington Menswear of New York City, a division of Burlington Industries Inc, has received a 30.5 mln dlr defense contract for 3.69 mln yards of tropical cloth, the Defense Logistics Agency said. reuter
